text: Authentic Ipoh taste, the Prawn Chicken  Hor Fun is nice. Strong prawn taste and not oily. Very good and light for a hot day. Price also reasonable at this area.

Came in the mall and found this place opened at 8am. As itâ€™s still early to go to shopping malls, we sat down to have breakfast. Great service from the staff and the food is nice. Recommended to come here if you come via Tuas Checkpoint ðŸ™‚
Came at 8.30am on a Sunday morning. 9 Mar 2025. Air-cond restaurant with a wide selection of dishes. All dishes shown in menu were available.

The nasi lemak sambal is good, rice and white coffee are average, but the ayam rempah is quite tasteless and the hard boil egg is over cooked, service is okay with friendly staff but too many flies which totally spoilt the dining experience here although we sit at the aircon session.

Tasted like original Ipoh
Hor Fun is great
White Coffee also great
Pricing almost on high side but still in affordable zone
Nice place to stop dine before heading Big Box
Will come again if ever pass by Sunway one day
